closed_reason: Changed default prefix from 'bd' to 'mb'. Simplified merge driver config check (removed legacy bd check). Updated tests to use 'mb' prefix. The 'bd' references for beads import functionality are intentionally kept for importing from reference beads CLI.
summary: Clean up remaining references to the old 'bd' (beads) command. This includes the merge driver config
title: Remove legacy 'bd' command references
